tool_description: A REST API to access private keys, build crypto wallets, and broadcast transactions to the blockchain.
name: Crypto Wallet
title: Crypto Wallet

api_list.name: Exchange Rate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-wallet.p.rapidapi.com/eth/exchange_rate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-wallet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-wallet.p.rapidapi.com/{coin}/exchange_rate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-wallet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
